summary.span: 利用 命名空间，可以方便地从托管代码中访问 Active Directory 域服务。

span.span: The namespace provides easy access to Active Directory Domain Services from managed code.

summary.span: 该命名空间包含两个组件类，即 和 ，它们使用 Active Directory 服务接口 (ADSI) 技术。

span.span: The namespace contains two component classes, and , which use the Active Directory Services Interfaces (ADSI) technology.

summary.span: ADSI 是 Microsoft 提供的一组接口，作为使用各种网络提供程序的灵活的工具。

span.span: ADSI is the set of interfaces that Microsoft provides as a flexible tool for working with a variety of network providers.

summary.span: 无论网络有多大，ADSI 都可以使管理员能够相对容易地定位和管理网络上的资源。

span.span: ADSI gives the administrator the ability to locate and manage resources on a network with relative ease, regardless of the size of the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间中的类可与任何 Active Directory 域服务服务提供程序。The classes in this namespace can be used with any of the Active Directory Domain Services service providers. 当前提供程序是： Internet 信息服务 (IIS)、 轻型目录访问协议 (LDAP)、 Novell NetWare 目录服务 (NDS) 和 WinNT。The current providers are: Internet Information Services (IIS), Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP), Novell NetWare Directory Service (NDS), and WinNT. ADSI 是 Microsoft Active Directory 域服务，使你的应用程序与使用一个接口的网络上的不同目录进行交互的编程接口。ADSI is a programmatic interface for Microsoft Active Directory Domain Services that enables your applications to interact with diverse directories on a network using a single interface. 使用 ADSI，可以创建执行常见任务，如备份数据库、 访问打印机，以及管理用户帐户的应用程序。Using ADSI, you can create applications that perform common tasks, such as backing up databases, accessing printers, and administering user accounts. 假设你已在使用这些类之前大致了解 Active Directory 域服务。It is assumed that you have a general understanding of Active Directory Domain Services before using these classes. Active Directory 域服务的详细信息，请参阅主题[Introduction to Active Directory 对象](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121193&clcid=0x409)和[Active Directory 技术背景知识](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121194&clcid=0x409)，以及中的以下主题在 MSDN 库[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library):For more information on Active Directory Domain Services, see the topics [Introduction to Active Directory Objects](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121193&clcid=0x409) and [Active Directory Technology Backgrounder](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121194&clcid=0x409), as well as the following topics in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library): - [使用 Active Directory 域服务Using Active Directory Domain Services](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121195&clcid=0x409) - [Active Directory 服务接口Active Directory Service Interfaces](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121197&clcid=0x409) - [轻型目录访问协议Lightweight Directory Access Protocol](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121198&clcid=0x409) - [实现 Active Directory 服务接口提供程序Implementing Active Directory Service Interfaces Providers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121199&clcid=0x409) - [绑定到 ADSI 对象Binding to an ADSI Object](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121200&clcid=0x409) - [IADsOpenDSObject::OpenDSObjectIADsOpenDSObject::OpenDSObject](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=121201&clcid=0x409) Active Directory 域服务使用树状结构。Active Directory Domain Services use a tree structure. 在树中每个节点包含一组属性。Each node in the tree contains a set of properties. 使用此命名空间来遍历、 搜索和修改树中，和读取和写入到的节点的属性。Use this namespace to traverse, search, and modify the tree, and read and write to the properties of a node. 类可封装 Active Directory 域服务层次结构中的节点或对象。The class encapsulates a node or object in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy. 使用此类用于绑定到对象、 读取属性，以及更新属性。Use this class for binding to objects, reading properties, and updating attributes. 帮助器类，以及生命周期管理和导航的方法，包括创建、 删除、 重命名、 移动子节点时，和枚举子级提供支持。Together with helper classes, provides support for life-cycle management and navigation methods, including creating, deleting, renaming, moving a child node, and enumerating children. 使用类来执行针对 Active Directory 域服务层次结构的查询。Use the class to perform queries against the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy. LDAP 是唯一系统提供 Active Directory 服务接口 (ADSI) 支持的提供程序搜索。LDAP is the only system-supplied Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) provider that supports searching. 通过 Active Directory 域服务层次结构的搜索返回的实例，其中包含的实例中类。A search of the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy through returns instances of , which are contained in an instance of the class. 注意： 类、 方法和属性中的许多命名空间使用代码访问安全选项。Note: Many of the classes, methods, and properties in the namespace use the code access security option. 这意味着代码访问安全性要求仅发生在实时编译过程，并且仅在调用程序集和不在整个调用堆栈中向上执行该要求。This means that the code access security demand only occurs during just-in-time compilation and that the demand is performed only on the calling assembly and not up the entire call stack. 因此，调用方不应传递到不受信任的代码从此命名空间在运行时创建的对象。Because of this, callers should not pass objects that are created from this namespace at runtime to code that is not trusted.
